passives.name: Critical Vision
passives.effects: Critical strikes cause enemies to bleed for an additional 90% bonus AD as magic damage over 3 seconds and reveal them for the duration.

passives.name: Trap Detection
passives.effects: Nearby stealthed enemy traps are revealed.

active.effects: Covers a target area in a stealth-detecting mist that grants vision for 5 seconds and reveals enemies that enter it for 3 seconds (60 second cooldown) (800 range, 375 AoE estimated).
